website_summaries.verdict: An affordable version of one of the most popular bowl shapes from the pricier Vinum range.
pros: These crystal glasses are machine-made in Europe and come with a faceted stem at the top and base, which catches the light and looks attractive on the table
cons: These are a thinner glass that’s more easily broken, including in transit

customer_reviews.title: These must be Chinese knock-offs!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to replace what should have been identical Riedel glasses that we broke. However these glasses are very inferior quality to the ones they're replacing. The crystal of the bowls is very wavy when you rotate the glasses (compared to the original glasses). One of the glasses has a very noticeable flaw in the rim, and the other glass has a flaw or a chip in the base, which is sharp enough to have drawn blood! Finally the Riedel logo on the bases of the glasses is actually wearing off (it should be permanently etched into the glass)! Overall these glasses look like cheap Chinese fakes, despite the Riedel box they came in appearing legitimate. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: James Garrison

customer_reviews.title: Not real Riedels.
customer_reviews.text: These are definitely not real Riedels. When comparing to matching Riedels I have there is a marked difference in the eveness of the glass. These are distorted while the other ones are clear. Besides four of the six glasses I ordered having arrived smashed I will keep them - but buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: Peter in Sherman Oaks

customer_reviews.title: Great value, wonderful glasses.
customer_reviews.text: I tried to resist the name Riedel. I've broken more wine glasses during my lifetime than I can count, and drank my share of wine. But I always resisted Riedel because I thought it was just marketing. (It's not.) They are actually amazing wine glasses, and this value-priced set of their glasses strikes the perfect balance of high quality and reasonable prices. Because of course, I am going to break these, either during hand-washing them, or you know, the million ways we break wine glasses. I have to admit, wine tastes better in Riedel.
customer_reviews.author: Paige Turner

customer_reviews.title: These are not Veritas series glasses, those are about ...
customer_reviews.text: These are not Veritas series glasses, those are about twice the price or more. These are a much cheaper line that are nowhere near the quality that people expect from the Vinum or Veritas series. These are misrepresented and should corrected or taken down.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Sairio

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I can see why people are upset about them breaking but they’re REALLY nice wine glasses for your pinot...thin glass so gentle hands for washing and holding. The stems are thicker and ridged, I’d have preferred them smooth. Friends have bought sets for themselves after enjoying them at my house.
customer_reviews.author: Stella

customer_reviews.title: Arrived suspiciously dirty.
customer_reviews.text: Even the cling labels on the individual glasses were peeling off. Otherwise they were intact but I would have been really embarrassed if these had been a gift. The glasses themselves are just okay- not really anything special. I have seen a better lip on cheaper glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Analog Nation

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Set
customer_reviews.text: I bought these wine glasses for a close friend for Christmas. Unfortunately, her boyfriend also gave her a set of Riedel wine glasses. I still gave her this gift with some trepidation. Thankfully, these were unique and she loves them! Besides being a quality glass, made in Germany not China (ugh!), there is beautiful detail around the base of the stem and the base of the glass. Hard to see on the pictures but there are triple glass circles in both places and the stem itself has a distinctively elegant detail. It is not a smooth stem but rather has raised impressions. It's elegant. Now I want some.
customer_reviews.author: brwneyedsusan

customer_reviews.title: Benchmark
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are the benchmark for other brands. The glass is thin and appears delicate. They're not fragile as they're made of borosilicate glass. You'll see the difference if you buy them.
customer_reviews.author: Stray Cat

customer_reviews.title: 2nd order of glasses
customer_reviews.text: I love these glasses. My parents came over for dinner and we also had some wine. They brought over the wine and said that it actually tastes a lot better out of our glasses. I let them know that there is a big difference in taste depending on the type of wine glass that they use. I gifted these to them and they are so happy that they have them now. Easy to hold and very durable. The best part is now they can really enjoy the taste due to these glasses. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Goose

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful glasses!
customer_reviews.text: Love these glasses - I am slowly replacing the few Pier One wineglasses I have left (many broken over the years) and these are just the right size and shape. I wouldn't put these in the dishwasher but hand wash to keep them beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Riedel is the only wine glass you should ever buy.
customer_reviews.text: A guest knocked over one of my Riedel wine glasses onto my granite counter top so of course it broke. The measurements on Amazon were so good I was able to match it perfectly with this new set. The price was great and it was packed impeccably to prevent breakage in a beautiful box (would make a perfect gift).
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Cheap imitation
customer_reviews.text: Not Riedel. The quality is inferior and not worth $5. They do not look or feel like Riedel glasses. The glass a a tan tint and overall they are clunky. Very dissatisfied. Wish I had read the reviews before ordering. It would be an embarrassment for Riedel to put their name on these glasses....oh but it is there Perhaps it washes off like a previous reviewer stated. Save you money and don’t buy these.
customer_reviews.author: R H.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and a great experience with wine.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful Cabernet/Merrot wineglasses. Pleasing clear tone when gently struck. I'm looking forward to years of use. They verily help one savor the wine.
customer_reviews.author: Seain Gutridge

customer_reviews.title: Simple elegance
customer_reviews.text: The problem was packing/shipping. One in each box ordered arrived broken. They have a nice deep bowl and a simple elegance that our friends loved. Even box wine tastes better!
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Riddle glasses are my favorite. I was however disappointed that these had a ...
customer_reviews.text: Riddle glasses are my favorite. I was however disappointed that these had a ridged stem. Otherwise the quality is amazing as always. They also arrived much quicker than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix25x

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful wine glasses
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful wine glasses. Very nice ring when you touch the glasses. Very light and thin, but still feel confident holding them. Sadly I knocked one of the glasses off the counter, but the other one has gone through many dishwasher cycles without any signs of wear.
customer_reviews.author: Barry L

customer_reviews.title: Looks and feels more expensive
customer_reviews.text: Love these glasses -- we keep saying how we love the feel of the stem, and that for glasses at this price we're very impressed with how these look and feel.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Absolutely beautiful. Unfortunately my dog knocked one over and broke it. Love them so much I just ordered a new set.
customer_reviews.author: l

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful champagne glasses that make your bubbly taste better
customer_reviews.text: I put off buying some "better" champagne glasses because I had a few mismatched glasses that were ... ok. I finally bought myself this set and all I can say is "wow". These glasses really do make the champagne taste better - plus they're nice to look at. One reviewer thought the base is too large - I feel it's a perfect size for how tall the glass is. Less chance of tipping! Overall, I'm delighted with this purchase and would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: CRGH

customer_reviews.title: Great Wine Glass
customer_reviews.text: Great midrange price for Riedel....Also have the more expensive ones and these are comparable for the price. If you never drank wine out of a Riedel glass, you need to... i’ve done a taste test with people and they’re amazed from a cheaper glass to this brand
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as expected and packaged nicely in box. Great quality
customer_reviews.author: C.S.H

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Love these wine glasses. Good quality and they are packaged nicely so arrive unscathed. I am typically a red wine drinker and already have the Riedel glasses so I was happy to find these to go along with them.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper101

customer_reviews.title: Classy gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my friend, whom loves my Reidel wine glasses. She LOVED them, along with the wine inside them, LOL!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: cheap, not handmade Riedel
customer_reviews.text: Not a "real" Riedel glass, but mass production. Stem is not smooth, but with ridges, so doesn't match any Riedel wine glass in my sets of Riedel. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Michael E Perie

customer_reviews.title: Great glasses
customer_reviews.text: I honestly can't say these glasses make my wine taste any better (this may change as I experiment with it some more), but they definitely look and feel nicer than most wine glasses I've used. The glasses are a lot bigger than I expected them to be, but that's not a bad thing. The only thing I didn't really like about the glasses are the stems. I would've preferred a more simple/plain design.
customer_reviews.author: nSx4

customer_reviews.title: Elegant & sleek
customer_reviews.text: I bought these glasses for a colleague for Christmas and she absolutely loved them. She was the envy of all the Secret Santa gifts in the entire office. I will definitely buy again, but this time the next pair will be for me
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great wine glasses, but one arrived broken. Sure to be replaced.
customer_reviews.text: Three arrived perfectly. One arrived broken as you can see from photo. Please send replacement. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Susan M.

customer_reviews.title: Fill 'er Up
customer_reviews.text: As always, Riedel does not disappoint! These are fine glasses.
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a Gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift for my friend. He's become a wine fanatic and these exactly what he wanted. Great quality for the price point.
customer_reviews.author: Karin L Buckley

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable results from using a different glass!
customer_reviews.text: My wife told me these glasses make wine taste better. My response is that they are just glass. But you know, she is right. The shape of the glass and the texture of the inside does something to open up the flavor of red wine. It even made our "house" wine taste special. They are also lovely, although a bit fragile.
customer_reviews.author: Karl Morgan

customer_reviews.title: feel fancy without the fancy price
customer_reviews.text: My favorite wine glasses! And these in particular are fairly cheap for Riedel. Very delicate, if you handle them with care they'll be fine. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Nkijsa

customer_reviews.title: Not a true Ridel Glass
customer_reviews.text: The glass is poor quality. It clouds and does not keep a clean look. Do not buy if you are a Ridel fan. You will be disappointed. Pay more for the REAL glasses!
customer_reviews.author: RMW

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful glasses but easily breakable
customer_reviews.text: Be careful when purchasing these glasses. I haven’t broken a wine glass in years and both of these broke while cleaning them in the sink within the first week. They looked beautiful but actually were quite dangerous. I was so disappointed as I was really looking forward to enjoying these glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly D.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful crystal
customer_reviews.text: Love them! Even like the sound they make when you flick your finger on them. Packaging was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: K. Granstrom

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and durable
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful glasses and perfect for the red of your choice needing to breath.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Thin Glass
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful glasses. The stem is beveled and my husband didn't like that. I thought it was pretty. If you are clumsy be careful with these. I broke one within two weeks and the glass is sooooo thin it was lodged in my skin and I couldn't get it out.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Nice glasses
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice wine glasses. They are not quite as elegant as the Riedel Vinium series, but these MUCH less prone to breaking then the Vinium glasses.
customer_reviews.author: BGN

customer_reviews.title: Classic stems
customer_reviews.text: As expected. Decent price when I purchased them for Christmas gifts
customer_reviews.author: My3best

customer_reviews.title: The best red wine glasses!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for everyday use or on special occasions. Reidel makes the best wine glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Canale

customer_reviews.title: Great glass
customer_reviews.text: Second time I got them. They don't last for long but the wine in my humble opinion does have a nicer presentation and taste for me. So well worth the money, just don't try washing them drunk or cheering too forcefully. Cheers.
customer_reviews.author: Saar Harel

customer_reviews.title: Softness of the glass curve, perfection in a glass
customer_reviews.text: Riedel the perfect glass for wine or water For anything liquid to drink. I love perfection in a glass.
customer_reviews.author: Ysee gaudel

customer_reviews.title: Glass does make a difference
customer_reviews.text: This wine glass does make a difference in taste and experience with drinking my wine. I love the feel of the glass when I hold it and also the rim of the glass when I drink from it. I can definitely taste the difference in the wine when I drink from this glass as opposed to the previous glasses that I drank from. The wine is bolder and holds the flavor much longer. Only complaint is the cleaning of the glass and removing the water spots. Everything else is top notch!
customer_reviews.author: Chris T.

customer_reviews.title: What's all the fuss?
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure that these wine glasses actually improve the wine, as some claim, but I like them enough. Maybe I don't have a discerning palette. Truly I can't tell any difference in the wine whether drinking from these crystal glasses or my everyday glass stemware from World Market. Seriously would not recommend to my friends at this price. But then maybe it's me...
customer_reviews.author: FleurJaune

customer_reviews.title: Could hear the glass rattle in the box
customer_reviews.text: Shipment was absurd for this product. No bubble wrap. It's fragile wine glasses! Needless to say I didn't even open the inner box since the glass was shaking around in the box. The glasses themselves are probably nice if intact. Riedel is a great brand.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Mc

customer_reviews.title: Great price for Riedel
customer_reviews.text: Bought 8 glasses (4 sets of 2). Very attractive. Great price for Riedel. And dishwasher safe! What else could you possibly want?!
customer_reviews.author: doctor j

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love these glasses. Be careful when washing because thin glass but that’s why I like them
customer_reviews.author: kelly wimberly

customer_reviews.title: ... have used these Riedel wine glasses for years and love them. Given how often I use them
customer_reviews.text: I have used these Riedel wine glasses for years and love them. Given how often I use them, if I was to break one, it wouldn't 'break the bank. The one thing I will say is I did not expect the stem to be faceted. Not my first choice, but I can live with it.
customer_reviews.author: gina

customer_reviews.title: Perfect glasses
customer_reviews.text: I saw these glasses used in a wine bar in Amsterdam and wanted to have some for the house. Was really glad I could get them through Amazon at a great price. The wine tastes better in the right glass and I think these are the right glasses. Nice, almost delicate feeling to the glass as you hold it and they are very attractive. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Corvette love

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: I love these glasses, especially with the rings at the bottom of the bowl of the glass.
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: Worth getting for vigonier or chardonnay wines specifically
customer_reviews.text: We bought Reidel white wine glasses several years ago, but then I discovered these smaller ones specifically for Vigonier and Chardonnay. They definitely make a difference. The wines taste better in these simple, yet effective smaller glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Presents Shopper

customer_reviews.title: I like the the large opening (can get my nose into ...
customer_reviews.text: I drink wine with this glass at dinner every night. I like the the large opening (can get my nose into it), the lightness of the fine glass, the balance, the narrow stem.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Arrived shattered
customer_reviews.text: Wine glasses arrived completely shattered. There was no label on the box that states there are fragile items OR handle with care.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Too delicate
customer_reviews.text: These are too delicate and break when you wash them
customer_reviews.author: Spencer Snipes

customer_reviews.title: Makes the wine taste even better!
customer_reviews.text: Someone told my wife and I about these glasses saying they make any wine taste better because of the way they are designed. We put the glass to the test side by side with another wine glass and to our surprise there was a difference that makes it worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: David Firmes

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Glassware
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are great and are both classy and, in my humble opinion, relatively durable. I would like to note, due to my inability to see it in the pictures, that the stem consists of four rods molded together rather than a singular, round rod. Just FYI in case you have a preference one way or the other.
customer_reviews.author: T. Fogarty

customer_reviews.title: Good price for the quality
customer_reviews.text: I like this series better than the Vinum. Although the glass shapes are similar, these are sturdier and a little more comfortable to drink from after having a glass or two.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie C

customer_reviews.title: My Best Purchase this year!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the quality of these glasses. They are very light weight & slender. I can’t wait to use for my wine tasting.
customer_reviews.author: Yolunda

customer_reviews.title: Feeling Fancy?
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are an amazing product. They aren't the nicest wine glasses in the world, but for the price they are definitely worth it. Treat yourself to a nice bottle of wine and glass worthy of it!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Wadell

customer_reviews.title: Good glasses when they survive shipping.
customer_reviews.text: I have used these glasses at friends house on the occasion, I like them very much, they add a lot to the wine drinking experience, enough so that I wanted some for myself. They are delicate, unfortunately they did not survive the shipping experience, I returned for refund with no issue. I will try again at another time.
customer_reviews.author: Surmount

customer_reviews.title: First Class Wine Glasses!
customer_reviews.text: Love the Riedel Cabernet/Merlot Wine glasses. They are classy all the way. You can't go wrong with these! I would definitely buy these Riedel wine glasses again.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy G

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous glassware
customer_reviews.text: These champagne glasses are very beautiful and made very well. High quality. Elegant design. Thin stem with no ridges. Perfect proportions.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: The perfect wine glass
customer_reviews.text: Best wine glass for Cabernet. Thickness of the glass is perfect — not too thick, not too thin.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Stiffler

customer_reviews.title: great replacements
customer_reviews.text: Bought a set of these glasses on a cruise and ended up breaking the two in this size. These are a little sturdier than the original but that is probably a good thing. The stem is stop sign shaped and kinda neat
customer_reviews.author: M. Monical

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: By far our favorite glasses at this price point. The stem has a beautiful fluted design which is a nice, unique touch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DOA
customer_reviews.text: I know those glasses are great but they were broken when they arrived. Poor packaging withOUT ANY protection materials in the box at all.
customer_reviews.author: Gillryu

customer_reviews.title: Quality glasses
customer_reviews.text: I am a fan of Riedel, they are always great glasses.
customer_reviews.author: lisa elliott

customer_reviews.title: Machine made, don't expect too much
customer_reviews.text: The size is larger than what I expected. Machine made so it's not exquisite in shape I have to say. Not my favorite glass.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I loved these so much that I gifted them to a friend!
customer_reviews.author: PLC

customer_reviews.title: Riedel
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of the Riedel Wine Series Champagne Glass, Set of 2. They are sturdy and went through the dishwasher with no isses. The base is much larger than I expected though, so I will not be ordering any more of these as I think it makes the glasses appear too bulky.
customer_reviews.author: anon

customer_reviews.title: Very serviceable wine glass although larger than most generic red ...
customer_reviews.text: Very serviceable wine glass although larger than most generic red wine glasses. Would give it four stars if were not for the fact that this is not a lead crystal product
customer_reviews.author: Robrt F Dunphy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the whole Series...these are best of the bunch....perfect balance.
customer_reviews.author: Garry T.

customer_reviews.title: Awful wine glasses
customer_reviews.text: Plastic like and then some. Return process has become over the wall complicated. HELP!!!!!! BUT YOU WONT HELP! MULTIPLE REQUESTS BUT NO RESPONSE.....SAD1
customer_reviews.author: Richard Czepinski

customer_reviews.title: Wine drinking in Riedel
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I wanted and expected. They are very nicely made and my wine taste better in this glass.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Basoff

customer_reviews.title: Great glasses
customer_reviews.text: Lovely wine glasses. The thinnest of the glass allows the wine to breathe but also means only hand washable and fragile. I would definitely buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

customer_reviews.title: Small Cab wineglasses
customer_reviews.text: Very small- I thought they would be taller-very excellent quality; will use for guests.
customer_reviews.author: maryanna mueller

customer_reviews.title: Broken glasses
customer_reviews.text: The products arrived broken from Amazon I would not order these again
customer_reviews.author: Mimi Barker

customer_reviews.title: it holds together better than the thin stemmed riedels
customer_reviews.text: The Bowl is of quality construction, it holds together better than the thin stemmed riedels. with the massive stepped/faceted stems, much better!
customer_reviews.author: Sean McKinney

customer_reviews.title: But they arrived perfect, matched and I am a happy wine drinker
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is that they have discontinued this glass, when I first purchase riedel glasses it's because I anticipated being able to tech them for at least 10 years. But they arrived perfect, matched and I am a happy wine drinker.
customer_reviews.author: SDL

customer_reviews.title: Thin yet Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: A beautiful, large, sturdy red wine glass that's still light and thin. I feel like Olivia Pope when drinking from this!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Kern

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We love Riedel stemware and this is a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Esther Amick

customer_reviews.title: These Riedel wine glasses gave a more decorative design and ...
customer_reviews.text: These Riedel wine glasses gave a more decorative design and are made of a thicker, less fragile glass than their early designs.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: These were larger than I expected but they are beautiful and do make a difference with my red wines
customer_reviews.text: These were larger than I expected but they are beautiful and do make a difference with my red wines. I would definitively order more Riedel Wine series glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Lilliam M. Mena

customer_reviews.title: Great glasses for everyday use and even for special occasions.
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for everyday use. I use my Vinum for guests.
customer_reviews.author: KEITH GAYLORD

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, tasteful glasses.
customer_reviews.text: Wine tastes better in Riedel glasses. True. Nice size and understated detail at the top of the stem.
customer_reviews.author: barefootcharlies74

customer_reviews.title: Delicate !
customer_reviews.text: The wine taste so much better.. they have an expensive feel in your hand.
customer_reviews.author: Dallas

customer_reviews.title: Good Value.  Worth it if you love wine.
customer_reviews.text: These work. You can taste the difference in your wine when compared with cheaper, not made for Cab/Merlot glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Presents Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great, reasonably price stemware.
customer_reviews.text: Can't go wrong with Reidel. Hand-Blown. Quality Stemware. I do not recommend putting in the dishwasher however. Awesome Stemware. Classy. A pleasure to imbibe out of. Recommend Hand-washing vs Dishwasher. I definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: eposner

customer_reviews.title: ... drinking from these Riedel wine glasses for years and love them. For the price you cannot beat it ...
customer_reviews.text: Been drinking from these Riedel wine glasses for years and love them. For the price you cannot beat it and if one breaks, it won't break the bank.
customer_reviews.author: gina

customer_reviews.title: Below usual Riedel standard
customer_reviews.text: Klunkier than other Riedel glasses I own, but still serviceable.
customer_reviews.author: David Dunlap

customer_reviews.title: perfect and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I love these glasses! They are amazing for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Giancarlo Pereira

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic almost perfect glasses for the price. Really good bouquet.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Hawk

customer_reviews.title: Awesome customer service
customer_reviews.text: Had initial shipping challenges which were beautifully and quickly addressed. Many thanks! Glasses are elegant.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Premo

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I got tired of drinking wine from a regular cup and decided it was high time to get some wine glasses. These came highly recommended and I must say wow what was I missing can really taste the flavor of my wine now. :)
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Great entry level riedel wine glass!
customer_reviews.text: Great all around red wine glass. It has a thin lip, nice bowl, and long stem.
customer_reviews.author: kosteg

customer_reviews.title: Not a big fan of the stems, a little ...
customer_reviews.text: Not a big fan of the stems, a little clunkier than what I was expecting. These are by no means delicate, but I couldn't really justify spending so much more for the next step up, so these were a decent compromise.
customer_reviews.author: Scott V

customer_reviews.title: Classical perfection
customer_reviews.text: Love them. Thin lip is very pleasing and makes wine taste better. Beautiful design. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Geo

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Love these glasses. We use them almost every day. They're gorgeous!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Caneva

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: One glass broke on the first day. They feel like they are not even made of glass!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy M. Talcott

customer_reviews.title: Pretty glasses; packaging needs improvement
customer_reviews.text: The glasses were great but the packaging (Riedel box) was a little flimsy and the glasses were touching each other - seems like they could have easily broken, but, thankfully, they didn't.
customer_reviews.author: LH

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Very nice glasses, light but so far very durable, light weight and a nice size for our reds. Opening at the top is small of course but large enough to fit a sponge in for cleaning
customer_reviews.author: M. Bendis

product_meta.title: Riedel Wine Series Pinot Noir Glass, Set of 2 - ,Clear
product_meta.description: Style:Pinot NoirThe durable machine-made Pinot Noir and Nebbiolo glass of the functional glass collection Wine Features a light-catching, decorative stem. The shape of the bowl supports peatiness flavor and the taste of plum of these sensual Red wines. This special collection was created for customers, who feel that plain stemware on a well laid table is just not decorative enough. All Riedel glasses are dishwasher safe.
feature_bullets: The durable machine-made Pinot Noir and Nebbiolo glass of the functional glass collection wine Features a light-catching, decorative stem
The shape of the bowl supports peatiness flavor and the taste of plum of these sensual red wines
This special collection was created for customers, who feel that plain stemware on a well laid Table is just not decorative enough
